title: [Large-scale] Online Ethics Education for Practitioners: Collaborative Case Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical problem-solving skills and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening the ability of current practitioners to address ethical dilemmas that may arise in math-related tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three ethical conflict cases that may occur during mathematical problem-solving processes
Can design ethical decision-making processes with peer practitioners through collaborative discussions
Can create a personal code of ethics applicable to actual job contexts and pass simulation evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
